p: where μ k,ref is the mean of climate variable k over the reference period (1981–1999), and μ k,fut the mean over the future period (2041–2059 or 2081–2099), σ k,ref is the s.d. of the interannual variability over the reference period. The letter i refers to the primary grid-cell, and j to any other grid-cell which i is being compared against.
